trans-unit.source: Provides a managed representation of a Win32 `OVERLAPPED` structure, including methods to transfer information from an Overlapped instance to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma representação gerida de um Win32 `OVERLAPPED` estrutura, incluindo métodos para transferir informações a partir de uma instância de Overlapped para um <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> methods transfer information from an Overlapped object to a <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure that can be passed to Win32 API functions for asynchronous file I/O.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>e <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>métodos de transferem de informações de um objeto de Overlapped para um <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>e/s de ficheiros de estrutura que pode ser transmitida para funções da Win32 API para assíncrona.</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> method transfers information from a <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure to an instance of the Overlapped class.
trans-unit.target: As <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>informações do método transferências a partir de uma <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura para uma instância de classe Overlapped.</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the properties of an Overlapped object affect its associated <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: As alterações às propriedades de um objeto de Overlapped afetam associado <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura e vice versa.</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância nova, vazia do <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> class with the specified file position, the 32-bit integer handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete, and an interface through which to return the results of the operation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> posicionar de classe com o ficheiro especificado, o identificador de número inteiro de 32 bits para um evento que está marcado depois de concluída a operação de e/s e uma interface através do qual pode devolver resultados da operação.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter o identificador de qualquer evento de sincronização gerido que derive da <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>classe.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your implementation of <xref:System.IAsyncResult> provides status information on the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.IAsyncResult>fornece informações de estado sobre a operação de e/s.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Transmita-o para o construtor no `ar` parâmetro e recuperá-lo mais tarde com a <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a callback method is specified for the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> method, the callback can retrieve your <xref:System.IAsyncResult> by unpacking the <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure it receives.
trans-unit.target: Se não for especificado um método de chamada de retorno para a <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>ou <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>a chamada de retorno do método, pode obter o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>por unpacking o <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura recebe.</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> </xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The low word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: A palavra baixa da posição do ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The high word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: A palavra elevada da posição do ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: O identificador a um evento que está marcado depois de concluída a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface and provides status information on the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>interface e fornece informações de estado sobre a operação de e/s.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> class with the specified file position, the handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete, and an interface through which to return the results of the operation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> posicionar de classe com o ficheiro especificado, o identificador de um evento que está marcado depois de concluída a operação de e/s e uma interface através do qual pode devolver resultados da operação.

trans-unit.source: To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> object, and then call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o identificador de um objeto de sincronização gerido que derive o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>classe, utilize o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter um <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle>de objeto e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Your implementation of <xref:System.IAsyncResult> provides status information on the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.IAsyncResult>fornece informações de estado sobre a operação de e/s.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Transmita-o para o construtor no `ar` parâmetro e recuperá-lo mais tarde com a <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.AsyncResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a callback method is specified for the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> method, the callback can retrieve your <xref:System.IAsyncResult> by unpacking the <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure it receives.
trans-unit.target: Se não for especificado um método de chamada de retorno para a <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>ou <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>a chamada de retorno do método, pode obter o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>por unpacking o <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura recebe.</xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> </xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The low word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: A palavra baixa da posição do ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The high word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: A palavra elevada da posição do ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: O identificador a um evento que está marcado depois de concluída a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface and provides status information on the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>interface e fornece informações de estado sobre a operação de e/s.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that provides status information on the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que fornece informações de estado sobre a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IAsyncResult>interface.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the 32-bit integer handle to a synchronization event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador de número inteiro de 32 bits como um evento de sincronização que está marcado quando a operação de e/s foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be used on 64-bit platforms.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser utilizada em plataformas de 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.EventHandleIntPtr%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.EventHandleIntPtr%2A>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.EventHandleIntPtr%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter o identificador de qualquer evento de sincronização gerido que derive da <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>classe.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value representing the handle of the synchronization event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que representa o identificador do evento de sincronização.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handle to the synchronization event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador para o evento de sincronização que está marcado depois de concluída a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> object, and then call the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o identificador de um objeto de sincronização gerido que derive o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>classe, utilize o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para obter um <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle>de objeto e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.DangerousGetHandle%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IntPtr>que representa o identificador do evento.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Frees the unmanaged memory associated with a native overlapped structure allocated by the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack*> method.
trans-unit.target: Liberta memória não gerida associada uma estrutura sobreposta nativa atribuída pelo <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack*>método.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack*>

trans-unit.source: You must call the Free method exactly once on every <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> pointer you receive from the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de chamar o método Free exatamente uma vez em cada <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>ponteiro receber o <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: If you don't call the Free method, you will leak memory.
trans-unit.target: Se não a chamar o método Free, será de fuga de memória.

trans-unit.source: If you call the Free method more than once, memory will be corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar o método Free mais do que uma vez, a memória irá estar danificada.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure to be freed.
trans-unit.target: Um ponteiro para o <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura para ser libertado.

trans-unit.source: nativeOverlappedPtr is .
trans-unit.target: nativeOverlappedPtris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the high-order word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a palavra de ordem de elevado da posição de ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The file position is a byte offset from the start of the file.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ficheiro é um deslocamento de byte desde o início do ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value representing the high word of the file position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>representando o word elevada da posição do ficheiro.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the low-order word of the file position at which to start the transfer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a palavra de ordem de baixo da posição de ficheiro no qual pretende iniciar a transferência.

trans-unit.source: The file position is a byte offset from the start of the file.
trans-unit.target: A posição do ficheiro é um deslocamento de byte desde o início do ficheiro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value representing the low word of the file position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>representando o word baixa da posição do ficheiro.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Packs the current instance into a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure, specifying the delegate to be invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes de instância atual para um <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura, especificando o delegado para ser invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: O apontador não gerido devolvido por este método pode ser transferido para o sistema operativo em operações de e/s sobrepostas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is fixed in physical memory until <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura é fixo na memória física até <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > O chamador é responsável por afixação a memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address.
trans-unit.target: Se o domínio de aplicação for descarregado, no entanto, o identificador da memória intermédia afixado é destruído e a memória intermédia é lançada, deixando a operação de e/s ao escrever para o endereço freed.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, it is better to use the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, é melhor utilizar o <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>sobrecarga de método em que o tempo de execução pins a memória intermédia.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Pack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"></xref> delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"> </xref> delegado que representa o método de chamada de retorno invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um apontador não gerido para uma <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> has already been packed.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> já foi packed.

trans-unit.source: Packs the current instance into a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure, specifying a delegate that is invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete and a managed object that serves as a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes de instância atual para um <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura, especificando um delegado que é invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída e um objeto gerido que funciona como uma memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: O apontador não gerido devolvido por este método pode ser transferido para o sistema operativo em operações de e/s sobrepostas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is fixed in physical memory until <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura é fixo na memória física até <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia ou memórias intermédias especificadas no `userData` tem de ser as mesmas transmitido para a função de sistema operativo não gerida que efetua a e/s assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in `userData` for the duration of the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O tempo de execução pins a memória intermédia ou memórias intermédias especificadas no `userData` durante a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Se o domínio de aplicação for descarregado, o tempo de execução mantém a memória afixada até concluir a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"></xref> delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"> </xref> delegado que representa o método de chamada de retorno invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: An object or array of objects representing the input or output buffer for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ou a matriz de objetos que representa a memória intermédia de entrada ou saída para a operação.

trans-unit.source: Each object represents a buffer, for example an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto representa uma memória intermédia, por exemplo, uma matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um apontador não gerido para uma <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> has already been packed.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> já foi packed.

trans-unit.source: Unpacks the specified unmanaged <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure into a managed <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Descompacta não gerido especificado <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura para uma gerido <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is not freed from physical memory until you call the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Free%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura não é libertada da memória física enquanto tem de chamar o <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Free%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Free%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um apontador não gerido para uma <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> object containing the information unpacked from the native structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> objeto que contém as informações descompactado na estrutura nativa de.

trans-unit.source: nativeOverlappedPtr is .
trans-unit.target: nativeOverlappedPtris .

trans-unit.source: Packs the current instance into a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure specifying the delegate to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes de instância atual para um <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura especificando o delegado para invocar quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: Does not propagate the calling stack.
trans-unit.target: Não é propagar a pilha de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: O apontador não gerido devolvido por este método pode ser transferido para o sistema operativo em operações de e/s sobrepostas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is fixed in physical memory until <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura é fixo na memória física até <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer.
trans-unit.target: O chamador é responsável por afixação a memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address.
trans-unit.target: Se o domínio de aplicação for descarregado, no entanto, o identificador da memória intermédia afixado é destruído e a memória intermédia é lançada, deixando a operação de e/s ao escrever para o endereço freed.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, it is better to use the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, é melhor utilizar o <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>sobrecarga de método em que o tempo de execução pins a memória intermédia.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%28System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using the <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> method could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Using a <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>método inadvertidamente foi possível abrir um negro de segurança.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack.
trans-unit.target: O código de bases de segurança de acesso que verifica a respetiva permissão nas permissões de todos os chamadores na pilha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A> method does not propagate the calling stack.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>método não propagar a pilha de chamada.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.UnsafePack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Código malicioso poderão exploram esta opção para evitar verificações de permissão.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"></xref> delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"> </xref> delegado que representa o método de chamada de retorno invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um apontador não gerido para uma <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> has already been packed.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> já foi packed.

trans-unit.source: Packs the current instance into a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure, specifying the delegate to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete and the managed object that serves as a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Pacotes de instância atual para um <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura, especificando o delegado para invocar quando a operação de e/s assíncrona foi concluída e o objeto que funciona como uma memória intermédia.

trans-unit.source: Does not propagate the calling stack.
trans-unit.target: Não é propagar a pilha de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: O apontador não gerido devolvido por este método pode ser transferido para o sistema operativo em operações de e/s sobrepostas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is fixed in physical memory until <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>estrutura é fixo na memória física até <xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Threading.Overlapped.Unpack%2A> </xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped>

trans-unit.source: The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia ou memórias intermédias especificadas no `userData` tem de ser as mesmas transmitido para a função de sistema operativo não gerida que efetua a e/s assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in`userData` for the duration of the I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução pins a memória intermédia ou memórias intermédias especificadas no`userData` durante a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Se o domínio de aplicação for descarregado, o tempo de execução mantém a memória afixada até concluir a operação de e/s.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Using the UnsafePack method could inadvertently open up a security hole.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Utilizando o UnsafePack método foi inadvertidamente abrir um negro de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack.
trans-unit.target: O código de bases de segurança de acesso que verifica a respetiva permissão nas permissões de todos os chamadores na pilha.

trans-unit.source: The UnsafePack method does not propagate the calling stack.
trans-unit.target: O método UnsafePack não propagar a pilha de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Código malicioso poderão exploram esta opção para evitar verificações de permissão.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"></xref> delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback"> </xref> delegado que representa o método de chamada de retorno invocado quando a operação de e/s assíncrona for concluída.

trans-unit.source: An object or array of objects representing the input or output buffer for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ou a matriz de objetos que representa a memória intermédia de entrada ou saída para a operação.

trans-unit.source: Each object represents a buffer, for example an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto representa uma memória intermédia, por exemplo, uma matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um apontador não gerido para uma <xref href="System.Threading.NativeOverlapped"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não tem a permissão necessária.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"></xref> is already packed.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Threading.Overlapped"> </xref> já é packed.
